body.name: Chicco Activ3 Jogging Stroller Travel System, Includes Chicco KeyFit 30 Infant Car Seat with Base, Lightweight Aluminum Frame, Stroller and Car Seat Combo, Baby Travel Gear | Solar/Grey
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 4 hrs 7 mins
features: BABY TRAVEL SYSTEM – Top-rated KeyFit 30 Infant Car Seat clicks directly into the Activ3 Jogging Stroller seat (no adapter required) for a convenient car seat and stroller combo.

EASY TO USE – Adjustable FlexCore rear suspension navigates rugged terrain, and foam-filled tires never go flat. Three one-hand fold configurations (standing fold, flat fold and quick-release wheels) offer multiple storage options.

EXCLUSIVE CONTROL CONSOLE – The Activ3 running stroller features a hand-operated parking brake to keep foot area clear and unobstructed, hand-operated locking front swivel wheel for on-the-go adjustment and 4-position handle.

RECLINING SEAT – Jogging stroller features a multi-position reclining seat with full-coverage, UPF 50+ extendable canopy and two peek-a-boo windows, large storage basket and detachable padded arm bar for easy in and out as child grows.

CAR SEAT AND BASE INCLUDED – Easy to install, the KeyFit 30 features premium LATCH connectors, a SuperCinch Force Multiplying Tightener, EPS energy-absorbing foam and removable head and body support, ideal for a newborn car seat.
body.description: Control at Your FingertipsCombining the features of a full-size stroller and a jogging stroller, the Activ3 offers versatile functionality at any pace. A lightweight aluminum frame and sleek three-wheel design are easy to maneuver, FlexCore rear suspension adjusts for smooth or rugged terrains, and foam-filled tires perform like air-filled tires but require no maintenance. An extendable UPF-rated canopy with peek-a-boo windows and reflective details offers parents peace of mind from dawn ‘til dusk.The exclusive Chicco Control Console includes hand-operated parking brake to keep foot area clear and unobstructed, hand-operated locking front swivel wheel for on-the-go adjustment and 4-position handle. A height-adjustable padded handle, soft parent tray with two cup holders and large storage basket accessible from the front and back of stroller provide added convenience.Folds for StorageThe Activ3 conveniently folds with one hand into three compact configurations: the standing fold is perfect for the garage; the front swivel wheel easily folds down to create a flat fold for the trunk, and quick-release wheels reduce the footprint for a compact travel stroller.Travel System—Stroller and Car SeatAn on-the-go parenting package, the baby stroller and car seat combo includes the KeyFit 30 Infant Car Seat, stay-in-car base and Activ3 Jogging Stroller for babies and toddlers. The car seat seamlessly transitions from vehicle to stroller with a secure, click-in attachment via the stroller arm bar.Easiest to Install KeyFit 30 The top-rated Chicco KeyFit 30 Infant Car Seat is engineered with innovative safety features that make it the easiest to install correctly. Latch connectors, RideRight bubble level-indicators and the ReclineSure spring-loaded leveling foot help achieve proper angle and fit in the vehicle seat. One-pull SuperCinch tightener applies force-multiplying technology for a secure fit with a fraction of the effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Buy!! Lightly compare to baby jogger :)
reviews.reviewText: So, I’m a mom to 3 already with one and our last on the way. I have done so much research on stroller and baby gear brands and have owned more strollers than I can count.Baby Jogger and Bob are ones that seem to be compared with this stroller a lot so I just want to touch base and say this travel system IS worth it.The car seat isn’t to bulky to where you’re breaking your back to carry like some other heavier brands. The stroller is comparable to the city mini GT but I’ll be the first to tell you that yes the BJ city mini/gt will feel a little better push wise and shorter in the front but that this is a completely very close second!A key difference is too that you’d have to buy an adaptor to use a car seat on the city mini or similar which means having to install and remove the adapter each time vs this stroller that has an almost equal ride with forever air tires like the city mini gt that can go over virtually any terrain without jarring your baby to death.I’m so glad I went with this stroller and I’ll definitely be buying an aftermarket snack tray for as baby gets older because there’s not one available yet for it, hopefully soon! Anyway I’m very satisfied with my purchase having owned several baby jogger strollers and a bob double in the past that this will more than comfortable serve us through babies first couple years. ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for any situation
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for jogging, walking and car rides. Was a little skeptical on the size fitting in our suv but it breaks down very easily and ticks in nicely

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Had an issue with front wheel rotation. Called Amazon support team they placed replacement order waiting for the new one giving 5star for the quality of the product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Car seat is rated highest in safety which is why I choice it. It works great and was easy to follow directions to install. Jogger stroller is amazing. Easy to lock and unlock for use. Easy to fold up and works on all terrain. Only downside is it can be a little bulky when storing. I don’t mind because it still fits in my vehicle but might be harder to put in smaller cars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not mother friendly
reviews.reviewText: Very disappointed to see the stroller , I thought it was expensive one , so I was expecting to be a perfect one. But it happens to be quite bad. There are no cupholders in front, which are always needed when you’re with a child. The wheels are also good either. Even the seat itself is not that comfortable. It doesn’t have a good cushion for the head.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It’s okNot as smooth as I expected. It’s also bulky and takes up lots of space. It was a gift and she likes it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really easy to assemble and use
reviews.reviewText: I love this set really nice not cheaply made. Perfect for what we need it for. Easy to assemble. Rides smoothly. Not sure what else to say but it’s perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has been a great stroller for us so far. I love to walk and run and it is easily maneuverable. It works well on the road and also off road. I did a lot of research before picking a stroller and I am super happy with my choice!
